array.string: Always remember to stay hydrated during workouts
When doing a squat, make sure to keep the weight on the heels, opposed to the toes or balls of the feet
Always remember to warm up before doing resistance training, pliable muscles reduce the chance of injury
If possible, avoid eating 2 hours before workouts
Try to eat a meal or consume a post-workout shake after exercise
To maximize results, try to exercise 3 to 5 days a week
Make sure to breathe! For best results breathe out when you are lifting weight against gravity and inhale when you are returning to starting position
For women who dont want to appear "bulky"; resistance training will help lose fat and gain lean muscle
After doing resistance training its best to stretch
